metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2335 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The CInArchive::ReadFileItem method in Archive/Udf/UdfIn.cpp in 7zip 9.20 and 15.05 beta and p7zip allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) or execute arbitrary code via the PartitionRef field in the Long Allocation Descriptor in a UDF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2335` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

p7zip - 9.20.1~dfsg.1-4+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
p7zip-full - 9.20.1~dfsg.1-4+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: p7zip package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.20.1~dfsg.1-4+deb7u2build0.14.04.1').
